pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sahāyakassa gharaṃ gantvā tassa pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ sayanighare nisajjaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.3: Atha kho so puriso yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—“dadehāyyassa bhikkhan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.5: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa bhikkhaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.6: Atha kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.7: Atha kho sā itthī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṃ puriso”ti, āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“nisīdatha, bhante, mā agamitthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.9: tatiyampi kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.10: Tatiyampi kho sā itthī āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—“nisīdatha, bhante, mā agamitthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.11: Atha kho so puriso nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.12: “ayaṃ, bhante, ayyo upanando mayhaṃ pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ sayanighare nisinno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.13: So mayā uyyojīyamāno na icchati gantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.15: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.16: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.17: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.20: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.23: “Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.6: itthī ceva hoti puriso ca, itthī ca puriso ca ubho anikkhantā honti, ubho avītarāgā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.10: mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11: Khuddake ghare piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1: Sayanighare sayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.2: Sayanighare vematiko sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.3: Sayanighare nasayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.2: mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati,
